item.title: Jacdac: Using the Black Magic programmer
item.description: Summary Using my home-made Black Magic Probe, I have to push the reset button at the start of each programming cycle, then release the button once I get a correct voltage statement, to get firmware to reliably load onto my Jacdac boards Introduction How do we program our Jacdac boards? One solution is to use a home-made Black Magic Probe (BMP) debugger. Instructions on how to make your own from a Blue pill board are here: https://github.
